entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or drizzle beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
